articles.description: American tech giant Apple is looking to change Siri's trigger phrase from 'Hey Siri', to just 'Siri', suggests a new report.
articles.content:
Currently, the trigger phrase 'Hey Siri' activates the voice assistant on Apple devices.

articles.title: Singer Aaron Carter dead at 34 - News24
articles.description: Aaron Carter, the American singer who soared to fame at the turn of the millennium with his hit album Aaron's Party (Come Get It), died Saturday. He was 34 years old.
articles.content:
• US singer Aaron Carter has died at the age of 34.
  • The singer was found dead in his bathtub.
